description:
UPDATE v1.2.1 - TWO NEW FEATURES ADDED!  A short sentence mode in the randomizer allows you to generate shorter sentences than the "full sentence" mode.  Also, you now have the ability to specify your own subject in ANY mode!  Simply choose "Specify Subject" from the application menu, type in your subject, tap OK and start creating your ultimate SoundSmart!  A small dictionary update is also included in this update.

Bucking for that big promotion but don't have the verbal chops to run with the big dogs?  Fear not cubicle dweller, SoundSmart's got the medicine!  One quick tap and you've got professional-grade jargon guaranteed to wow even the most seasoned office veterans!

With the power of SoundSmart you can quickly and effectively generate phrases and sentences chock full of the latest buzzwords and business jargon for use in any office situation with our randomizer!  Need to fine-tune your work of art?  No problem, just tap the custom button and you can re-randomize each individual portion of your phrase or sentence until you've got it just right!  With one-touch on-screen buttons for copy, SMS, email and Facebook status* (requires Palm's Facebook application, free in the App Catalog) you can send your SoundSmart creations to anywhere, anytime, effortlessly.

Never feel inferior to the guy with the corner office again with SoundSmart: Corporate Edition on your side!
